summary: New mesh for Apprentice Mage Robes.
descriptionHtml:
Built on CBBE CT77 preset from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259/?]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and BBP.[/url] Uses the underwear from there too.

Textures in the screenshot are from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35002/?]Opulent Outfits[/url] and are highly recommended. Note that the hoods added by Opulent Outfits are buggy for beast races; the Armor Addon\'s texture sets for them are wrong. You can fix it in TES5Edit with a little copy/pasting.

v2: Now supports Bodyslide and includes panty texture.
v2.1: Forgot to set the mesh to double sided while making Bodyslide support. Fixes being able to see through the robes from different angles. 
v2.2: Briefly had the wrong files uploaded.
author: mxwqtkl
